4. Place 3 - Kent McKinney

Place 3 - Kent McKinney
=======================

Term
----

**May 2024 - 2026**

Kent McKinney retired after a longtime banking career that saw him serve as chairman and CEO of four different banks. Kent served four years on the Kerrville Economic Improvement Corporation (EIC) and is a past chairman of the Kerrville Area Chamber of Commerce and Dietert Center boards. He has also served on numerous other boards, including the Upper Guadalupe River Center, Kerrville Public School Foundation, and the Hill Country Arts Foundation.

1. ![Place 3 Councilmember - Kent McKinney](https://kerrvilletx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=44265 "Place 3 Councilmember - Kent McKinney")

   #### Kent McKinney

   Councilmember - Place 3

   [Kent.McKinney@kerrvilletx.gov](mailto:Kent.McKinney@kerrvilletx.gov)
